body:
[jw@cn05 jw]$ spack/bin/spack install usearch
==> Installing usearch-10.0.240-7y7pkywjo6gpygmcw4xsut5agwmbj6hj
==> No binary for usearch-10.0.240-7y7pkywjo6gpygmcw4xsut5agwmbj6hj found: installing from source
==> Error: FetchError: Manual download is required for usearch. Refer to http://www.drive5.com/usearch/ for download instructions.

/data/jw/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1335, in do_fetch:
       1332                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
       1333
       1334        self.stage.create()
  >>   1335        err_msg = None if not self.manual_download else self.download_instr
       1336        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)
       1337        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1338

[jw@cn05 jw]$ spack/bin/spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-948-9d1d37c432
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-a64fx
* **Concretizer:** original

title: Installation issue: usearch on A64FX
